description:
GPIO pin configuration for external control integration.

Four configurable GPIO pins for: - Remote mute/unmute control - Fault indicators - External trigger inputs

gpio1.description: GPIO pin 1 function (Off, MuteIn, FaultOut, etc.)

gpio2.description: GPIO pin 2 function (Off, MuteIn, FaultOut, etc.)

gpio3.description: GPIO pin 3 function (Off, MuteIn, FaultOut, etc.)

gpio4.description: GPIO pin 4 function (Off, MuteIn, FaultOut, etc.)

title: Gpio
